app.common.howMuchWithdraw: How much do you want to withdraw?
app.components.CampaignForm.inventoryFor:
Instructions

To start an advertising campaign, fill in all the form fields. If you want to squeeze maximum efficiency, we recommend you to input as much detail as possible.

Campaign Name
Check the name of your newly creating campaign. For example: Children's toys 24-55, China.
Type of desired audience
Select a campaign type - Start engagement with new audience or roll out a retargeting campaign - reach out to your audience for repetitive sales.
Advertising strategy
Select the type of advertising you are interested in depending on your goals.
24 hour display frequency
Specify how many times we are eligible to display your ad to one user. For example: 5.
Advertising time
Specify the date and time of the beginning and end of the advertising campaign. If you wish the campaign not to stop running, leave the field "End Date" empty.
Budget and Daily Budget
Indicate how much you want to spend on an advertising campaign, total or per day. If there are no restrictions, leave the fields blank.
Views and Daily Views
Indicate how many impressions your ad should get, total or per day. If there are no restrictions, leave the fields blank.
Show position
Specify where to show your banners. At the top of the page in the visible part or below on the second scroll screen. Choose "default" if you want the system to decide how it will be better.

Reports

Select counter
Specify which site will display your advertising, it is necessary to select one of the counters in order to accurately check the traffic parameters and reduce the risk of fraud on the part of advertising networks. For example, if you start advertising for the site www.ubex.com, be sure to create and install a counter on it in the "Counters" section
Automatic iterruption of the advertising campaign when the site is unavailable.
Check the box if you want to disable ads when your site is unavailable. Our system checks the availability of your site every minute, if at some point it stops working, the system begins to monitor it even more actively. If the site does not resume within 3 minutes, we will stop advertising and save your budget.
Email
Specify an email for notifications when the site is unavailable. We recommend external mail created outside the advertised domain.
Add creative banner
Choose which creatives to show in this ad campaign. The number is not limited. If you have not yet loaded creatives into the system, skip this block and load banners after creating a campaign.

Targets

Geography
Specify which locations represent the interest of yours to display ads.
Categories
Specify the topics of websites where your ads should be run. Leave it blank if you have no certain preference. In this scenario the system will automatically identify your audience.
Temporary restrictions
Specify at what time and what weekdays your ads should be displayed.

Devices

If you want to target your ads to certain devices, operating systems or to certain browsers only, specify the necessary campaign settings. If there are no restrictions, leave the fields blank.

Audience

Specify the age and gender groups of your audience. In case you want to display ads to different age or sex segments, then we recommend creating a separate advertising campaign for each audience segment and adding the necessary creative banners to it for the selected audience.

Blacklist

Specify which sites you do not allow to display ads. If there are no restrictions, leave the field blank.
app.components.CampaignForm.stopAdvertis: Stop advertising if the site is not available for more than 3 minutes in a row.
app.components.CreativeForm.help.instruc:
Instructions

Assign the name of the creative banner. For example, general product banners for Germany.

Select on your hard drive the desired images (banners) to be uploaded into the system. For your convenience we let you upload all the banners in one ZIP archive.

SINGLE PACKAGE UPLOADING OF BANNERS IS AVAILABLE. SELECT .ZIP ARCHIVE WHICH CONTAINS MANY PICTURES WITH BANNERS OR SEPARATE .ZIP ARCHIVES FOR HTML5

Formats available
We do support jpeg, png, gif, zip formats.

After uploading completed, specify the banner size and the link which will lead to a destination page upon the banner has been clicked.
If necessary, add a third-party counter code.

For HTML5

  • The banner must be a ZIP archive that contains inside all the files necessary for the smooth banner work .
  • The size of a single ZIP archive should not exceed 150Kb. Restriction on the size of files inside the archive: html, js, jpeg, png, gif - 600 Kb; other file types - 600 Kb. Restrictions are checked separately for each component of the banner.
  • The name of the main file should be index.html and it should be the only HTML file in the archive.

Instructions

To create native advertising, fill in all the fields in the form. Upload two pictures for the icon and the main image. The main image is required.

Title
The title of the advertisement, a brief descriptive text associated with the advertised product or service. Maximum of 50 characters (required field).
Call to action
The text of the action call, the inscription on the button with a link. For example, "Learn More" or "Download." Maximum of 20 characters.
Description
Write a description for your ad no longer than 99 characters (required field).
Additional description
Additional advertising text - pay attention to the fact that the user will see an advertisement that is no longer than 25 characters (a mandatory field). For example, "Sponsored by our company."
Click URL
Input the URL which user will be redirected to after clicking on the ad.
Third party view tracking
Put here the counter code of external tracking services.

Instructions

Video requirements

  • The video size should not exceed 10 MB.
  • The recommended video format is MP4. Required video compression standard - H.264 video codec (full MPEG-4 Part 10 AVC / H.264 title) For placement on the Google AdX channel, you need to download WEBM format in addition to MP4
  • The minimum recommended video length is 12 seconds. The maximum recommended video length is 3 minutes.
  • Frame rate - 30 frames / sec.
app.components.CreativeForm.requirements:
• A separate banner should be a ZIP-archive, inside which are all the files necessary for the banner.
  • A separate ZIP archive should not exceed 150KB. Restriction on the size of files inside the archive: html, js, jpeg, png, gif, other file types - 600 Kb. Restrictions are checked separately for each component of the banner.
  • It is necessary that all banner files are necessarily located in the same folder as the main HTML file. Those. There should not be additional folders for images or js-files.
  • The name of the main file should be index.html and it should be the only HTML file in the archive.
  • For the file name, it is permissible to use only the Latin alphabet, numbers and the underscore character.
app.components.CreativeForm.title: Title
app.components.Developers.developersText:
The Ubex project invites all SSP networks around the world to join the revolutionary programmatic advertising platform and cooperate on profitable terms as never before.

The Ubex platform is a decentralized advertising exchange working on the blockchain with the application of programmatic algorithms aimed at providing intermediary-free advertising placement on a variety of online channels with unprecedented targeting accuracy through the use of AI and neural networks. Ubex welcomes all SSP networks to join the platform and take advantage of its unique product offering.

More detailed information on integration and step-by-step instructions can be found in manual.

app.components.InventoryForm.inventoryFo:
Instructions

Add site. Fill in all fields of the form.

Name
the name of your site in a convenient form. For example, the site about children's toys.
Domain
the domain of your site. For example, https://ubex.com
Aliases
if you have more than one domain, specify here all the domains of this site, so that we show ads on these resources.
Language
specify the main language of the site.

Black list

If you do not want for any reason to display ads from certain sources or specific topics, please indicate your desire in the form below.

Block categories
choose which categories of ads should not be shown on your site.
Blocked networks
Choose which ad networks will not be allowed to appear on your site.

Instructions

Add Bundle. Fill in all fields of the form.

Name
the name of your site in a convenient form. For example, the site about children's toys.
Bundle ID
the Bundle ID of your App. For example, com.ubex.application
Language
specify the main language of the site.

Black list

If you do not want for any reason to display ads from certain sources or specific topics, please indicate your desire in the form below.

Block categories
choose which categories of ads should not be shown on your site.
Blocked networks
Choose which ad networks will not be allowed to appear on your site.

app.components.SlotForm.counterForm.help:
Instructions

Creating a slot. To create an advertising slot for your site. fill out the form below.

Name
the name of your slot in a convenient form. For example, banner 728 in footer.
Devices
specify for which types of devices you would like to show it. If you want to show ads in adaptive interfaces, you need to create a separate slot for each type of device.
Position
specify where your slot will be.
Size
select from the list the option of the size of advertising space. If you allow us to show ads of a different size in this slot (no problems with layout). Check the "Show different ad formats" box and specify the maximum slot parameters.
Floor Price (CPM)
set the minimum CPM manually or let us dynamically determine the optimal minimum price for the placement by setting the corresponding checkbox "Show at the best price"
Back fill
tag is an optional tag that can be used if the placement is not filled. We can display your tag from this field there.

Black list

If you do not want for any reason to display ads from certain sources or specific topics, please indicate your desire in the form below.

Block categories
select which categories of ads should not be shown in this slot.
Blocked attributes
which attributes do not show in your slot.

Instructions

Creating a slot. To create an advertising slot for your site. fill out the form below.

Name
the name of your slot in a convenient form. For example, banner 728 in footer.
Position
specify where your slot will be.
Size
select from the list the option of the size of advertising space. If you allow us to show ads of a different size in this slot (no problems with layout). Check the "Show different ad formats" box and specify the maximum slot parameters.
Floor Price (CPM)
set the minimum CPM manually or let us dynamically determine the optimal minimum price for the placement by setting the corresponding checkbox "Show at the best price"
Back fill
tag is an optional tag that can be used if the placement is not filled. We can display your tag from this field there.

Black list

If you do not want for any reason to display ads from certain sources or specific topics, please indicate your desire in the form below.

Block categories
select which categories of ads should not be shown in this slot.
Blocked attributes
which attributes do not show in your slot.

app.containers.DataMiner.attentionCounte: ATTENTION! Please add only websites that considered valid according to the Publisher's Agreement. The websites that break accepted policies will not pass moderation and application will be revoked.
app.containers.DataMiner.counterForm.agr: I accept Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of the service
I wish Ubex to keep IP address of my website or mobile app visitors anonymized (applicable for the websites dealing with EU and Switzerland citizens)
app.containers.DataMiner.counterForm.cou:
Copy and paste the code into the HTML template of your website. The code should be allocated in between of the 
<head></head>
and 
<body></body>
tags. Set the code as close to the top of the page as possible so that it gets loaded withing the shortest time period. In case of using Google Tag Manager, create a new Custom HTML tag and put our counter code snippet into it. Don't forget to check the "All pages" trigger.
